description.value:
You are particularly sensitive to the presence of ambient magic. You can cast the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic} cantrip as an innate @Localize[PF2E.TraitDivine] cantrip at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell rank equal to half your level rounded up. If you already know the detect magic cantrip, you gain another cantrip of your choice from the @Localize[PF2E.TraitDivine] tradition.

Special If you're a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.heritages.Item.QLbzGdw8lzEcmRSi]{Mist-Frenzied} Viera, the detect magic cantrip gained is of the @Localize[PF2E.TraitOccult] tradition, and you select from @Localize[PF2E.TraitOccult] cantrips if you already have it.
